TEXT.TITLE: BALL CORP <BLL> COMPLETES ACQUISITION OF VERAC
TEXT.BODY: Ball Corp said it completed the acquisition of privately held Verac Inc. Terms were not disclosed. The company said the San Diego-based defense systems and software development company had sales of about 23 mln dlrs in 1986 and will operate as part of Ball's technical products group. Reuter
